subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The St. John’s men’s golf team will play as an at-large selection in an N.C.A.A. regional tournament Thursday through Saturday. It is the Red Storm’s first N.C.A.A. bid since 2001.
snippet: The St. John’s men’s golf team will play as an at-large selection in an N.C.A.A. regional tournament Thursday through Saturday. It is the Red Storm’s first N.C.A.A. bid since 2001.
